column1: Under Section 45 of the said Act, the assessment of compensation should be
calculated at the market value of the subject matter as at the date of the notice
under Section 7 of the Act. Section 45 reads as follows;

column2: “(1) For the purposes of this Act the market value of a land in respect of
which  a  notice  under  Section  7  has  been  published  shall,  subject  as
hereinafter provided, be the amount which the land might be expected to
have realized if sold by a willing seller in the open market as a separate
entity on the date of publication of that notice in the Gazette :
